data.actual_result: The warning is not relevance with the thing
data.expected_result: That "You are viewing older messages warning should not be"
data.short_description: Deleting message which one is shared by link, clicking link causes "You are viewing older messages"
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message to someone on DM - Hold the message and select share button - Share it same with the person you wrote for - Delete your message - Click the link and you will see "You are viewing older messages" for 5 secs.
